jobDescription: Execute on-site installation and commissioning activities and in-house integration activities.  System Integration, Site survey, Site Installation, Commissioning, FAT & SAT as per defined Scope of Work. Co-ordination with Customers and Vendors. Project Documentation. Ensuring proper test equipment. Generating Fault Incidence reports. Handling Logistics. Preparing site related Material requisition. Supporting Senior Engineer during Trainings to Customer. System Corrective and Preventive Maintenance. Maintaining & Enhancing QMS & HSE effectively.
requiredSkills: Installation and commissioning of Telecom equipment
